metadata.Title: CVE-2020-26557 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium.
metadata.Description: Mesh Provisioning in the Bluetooth Mesh profile 1.0 and 1.0.1 may permit a nearby device (without possession of the AuthValue used in the provisioning protocol) to determine the AuthValue via a brute-force attack (unless the AuthValue is sufficiently random and changed each time).

criterions.comment: linux package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
linux-allwinner package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.

linux-ibm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of life, was needs-triage').
